## Before the workshop

Bring your laptop with the latest version of Positron installed. For this workshop in particular, it may be worth it to install a pre-release (instead of the monthly release). See [Setup](setup.qmd) for more.

## Instructor

[Jenny Bryan](https://github.com/jennybc) is a senior software engineer at Posit.
She's mostly on loan to the Positron team these days, but she keeps a hand in R package development, as part of the tidyverse team.
